price: 6. Ô homme ! Qu’est-ce qui t’a donc leurré au sujet de ton Noble Seigneur
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu mā gharraka birabbika al-karīmi
